<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs=""
>
[Slick](/Equipment.aspx?ID=289)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 583 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This property makes armor slippery, as though it were coated with a thin film of oil. You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks to Escape and Squeeze.
